title: How To RGB Your Gaming Life!
description: Thermaltake was showing off new gaming desks and gaming peripherals at CES 2019.  Some of them were pretty interesting.    A special thanks to all our sponsors:  Thermaltake Corsair Phanteks  Razer MSI  As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (from Amazon):  Main 4K Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second 4K Camera -  $700 4K Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #thermaltake #ces2019 #hardwarecanucks
